channel.title: MLP Craft
channel.description: Hello MoparCraft community! I'm trying to get players for my rather new server. We are recruiting staff also. There is a mod and possibly a admin spot still open. It is a survival pvp server with factions, shops, Obstacle courses that reward diamonds,ingame currency, :) and soon we are going to have a hunger games world! We are open for suggestions so please feel free. My ingame name on Minecraft is Goldenstonez, and I'm the co-owner of MLP craft. We would really love it if you joined and i hope someone reads this post! (: Thanks ~ By the way if i notice you're being rather active I'll reward you with a level 20 enchanted pick and 127 unbreakable. (: IP: Mlp-mc.no-ip.info Forums: Mlp-mc.no-ip.biz Thanks and have a nice day! (:

item.title: MLP Craft
item.dc:creator: @agspwns agspwns
item.description:
@agspwns wrote:

Hello MoparCraft community! I’m trying to get players for my rather new server. We are recruiting staff also. There is a mod and possibly a admin spot still open. It is a survival pvp server with factions, shops, Obstacle courses that reward diamonds,ingame currency, and soon we are going to have a hunger games world! We are open for suggestions so please feel free. My ingame name on Minecraft is Goldenstonez, and I’m the co-owner of MLP craft. We would really love it if you joined and i hope someone reads this post! (: Thanks ~ By the way if i notice you’re being rather active I’ll reward you with a level 20 enchanted pick and 127 unbreakable. (: IP: Mlp-mc.no-ip.info Forums: Mlp-mc.no-ip.biz Thanks and have a nice day! (:

Read full topic
